under.construction.title: Website Under Restoration
under.construction.text: This website is currently being restored after a long break. Only part of the pages are available, and the data shown is for demonstration purposes only and not clickable. Full functionality will be gradually restored.
page.about.info.intro.title: Introduction
page.about.info.intro.text: I am full stack web developer and work in IT for 5 years. I have a lot of completed projects from web to mobile applications. But I choose one main sphere: Front-end. Nowadays I closely working with blockchain.
page.about.info.pseudonym.title: Pseudonym
page.about.info.pseudonym.text: Amary Filo don't have defenition. It's just random things which created from animal Llama ðŸ¦™, so they become to my logo.
page.about.info.tagline.title: Tagline
page.about.info.tagline.text: 'Nothing is impossible in programming. In any case, there is always search engine at hand.' - amaryfilo
page.about.info.hobbies.title: Hobbies
page.about.info.hobbies.text: I create web and mobile designs. Some of this I use in my in projects. Rarely I'm playing games and stream it on Twitch or in Game Live Stream.
